TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpSessionState extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpSessionState Implements ICollection
public ref class HttpSessionState sealed : System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 提供工作階段狀態值以及工作階段層級設定和存留期 (Lifetime) 管理方法的存取權。

span.span: Provides access to session-state values as well as session-level settings and lifetime management methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了工作階段狀態管理，可讓您儲存在多個要求相關聯的唯一瀏覽器工作階段的資訊。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 您可以儲存參考索引鍵的名稱或數值索引值的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 存取工作階段值和功能是提供使用類別，可透過存取屬性的目前，或屬性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current , or the property of the . 工作階段資料使用的唯一識別碼的特定瀏覽器工作階段都會關聯。Session data is associated with a specific browser session using a unique identifier. 根據預設，這個識別碼會儲存在不會過期的工作階段 cookie，在瀏覽器中，但是您也可以設定您的應用程式儲存在 URL 中的工作階段識別項，藉由設定`cookieless`屬性`true`或項目中您的應用程式組態。By default, this identifier is stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser, but you can also configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL by setting the `cookieless` attribute to `true` or in the element of your application configuration. 您可以判斷是否瀏覽器是否支援 cookie 所指定的值是 ASP.NET如`cookieless`屬性。You can have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are supported by the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 您也可以判斷是否啟用 cookie 的瀏覽器所指定的值是 ASP.NET如`cookieless`屬性。You can also have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are enabled for the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 如果支援 cookie，則當已指定，或已啟用時指定，則工作階段識別碼會儲存在 cookie 中; 否則為將在 URL 中儲存的工作階段識別碼。If cookies are supported when is specified, or enabled when is specified, then the session identifier will be stored in a cookie; otherwise the session identifier will be stored in the URL. 在第一個要求已啟動工作階段和工作階段值會保存下來，只要瀏覽器建立新的要求中指定的分鐘數之前屬性傳遞。Sessions are started during the first request and session values will persist as long as a new request is made by the browser before the number of minutes specified in the property pass. 新的工作階段開始時，則工作階段就會引發事件。When a new session begins, the session event is raised. 您可以使用此事件執行任何額外的工作，工作階段，例如，設定預設工作階段值的開頭。You can use this event to perform any additional work at the start of a session, such as setting default session values. 當工作階段逾時時，呼叫方法時，或 ASP.NET 應用程式關閉時，工作階段就會引發事件。When a session times out, the method is called, or the ASP.NET application is shut down, the session event is raised. 您可以使用此事件執行任何必要的清除。You can use this event to perform any necessary cleanup. 就會引發事件時，才將工作階段狀態`mode`設。The event is raised only when the session state `mode` is set to . 若要改善效能，就會使用 cookie 的工作階段未配置工作階段儲存直到資料實際上儲存在物件。To improve performance, sessions that use cookies do not allocate session storage until data is actually stored in the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. 工作階段狀態不會保存跨 ASP.NET 應用程式界限。Session state does not persist across ASP.NET application boundaries. 如果瀏覽器瀏覽至其他應用程式，工作階段資訊不適用於新的應用程式。If a browser navigates to another application, the session information is not available to the new application. 根據預設，工作階段值會儲存在 Web 伺服器上，記憶體中。Session values are stored in memory on the Web server, by default. 您也可以儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫、 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器或自訂伺服器的工作階段值。You can also store session values in a SQL Server database, an ASP.NET state server, or a custom server. 這可讓您保留工作階段值，在其中的 ASP.NET 或 IIS 程序或 ASP.NET 應用程式重新啟動的情況下，並使工作階段值可供 Web 伺服陣列中的所有伺服器。This enables you to preserve session values in cases where the ASP.NET or IIS process or the ASP.NET application restarts and to make session values available across all the servers in a Web farm. 此行為設定，藉由設定`mode`屬性設為有效的應用程式組態項目中的值。This behavior is configured by setting the `mode` attribute to a valid value in the element of your application configuration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4). 工作階段狀態的替代方案包括應用程式狀態 (請參閱屬性) 和 ASP.NET 快取 (請參閱命名空間)，可以存取 ASP.NET 應用程式的所有使用者的存放區變數; ASP.NET 設定檔 (請參閱命名空間)，其中保存資料存放區中的使用者值沒有到期使用逾時。ASP.NET ，其中保存控制項中的值;;屬性; 和 HTML 表單上的欄位，您可以從 HTTP`POST`使用集合。Alternatives to session state include application state (see the property) and the ASP.NET cache (see the namespace), which store variables that can be accessed by all users of an ASP.NET application; the ASP.NET profile (see the namespace), which persists user values in a data store without expiring them using a time-out; ASP.NET , which persist control values in the ; ; the property; and fields on an HTML form that are available from an HTTP `POST` using the collection. 如需工作階段狀態和其他狀態管理替代項目之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理建議](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af79fa0d-4bc8-47a6-9915-d8e355bfb732)。For more details on the differences between session state and other state-management alternatives, see [ASP.NET State Management Recommendations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af79fa0d-4bc8-47a6-9915-d8e355bfb732). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定並擷取工作階段狀態的值。The following code example sets and retrieves values from session state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSessionState#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/session2cs.aspx#30)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSessionState#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/session2vb.aspx#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 取消目前的工作階段。

span.span: Cancels the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次呼叫方法時，目前工作階段已不再有效，而且可以啟動新的工作階段。Once the method is called, the current session is no longer valid and a new session can be started. 會導致會引發事件。 causes the event to be raised. 新會引發事件，在下一個要求。A new event will be raised on the next request. 已放棄，或已過期的工作階段的工作階段識別項會回收預設。Session identifiers for abandoned or expired sessions are recycled by default. 也就是提出要求的已過期或已放棄的工作階段包含的工作階段識別碼，如果新的工作階段就會啟動使用相同的工作階段識別項。That is, if a request is made that includes the session identifier for an expired or abandoned session, a new session is started using the same session identifier. 您可以藉由設定停用此`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性的組態項目`true`。You can disable this by setting `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute of the configuration element to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段識別元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/146ca206-d151-4f2e-a548-bcca05ccf0cb)。For more information, see [Session Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/146ca206-d151-4f2e-a548-bcca05ccf0cb). 支援事件時，才屬性設定為。The event is supported only when the property is set to .

Public Sub Add (name As String, value As Object)

param.name: name
param.span: 要加入工作階段狀態集合中的項目名稱。

span.span: The name of the item to add to the session-state collection.

param.name: value
param.span: 要加入工作階段狀態集合中的項目值。

span.span: The value of the item to add to the session-state collection.

summary.span: 將新項目加入至工作階段狀態集合。

span.span: Adds a new item to the session-state collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`參數參考現有的工作階段狀態項目時，現有的項目會覆寫具有指定`value`。If the `name` parameter refers to an existing session state item, the existing item is overwritten with the specified `value`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用工作階段狀態中儲存值方法。The following example shows how to store values in session state by using the method. 它也示範如何使用工作階段狀態中移除值方法。It also shows how to remove values in session state by using the method. A控制項用來在網頁上顯示內容的工作階段狀態。A control is used to display the contents session state on the Web page. 方法用來逐一查看工作階段狀態集合，並填入控制項。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的字集識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

value.span: 目前工作階段的字元集識別項。

span.span: The character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元集 （字碼頁） 用來解譯多位元組字元資料，判斷字元值，並排序次序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multi-byte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 字碼頁設定僅適用於多位元組字元資料，而無法 Unicode 字元資料。Code-page settings apply only to multi-byte character data, not to Unicode character data. 這提供屬性為了與 ASP 的舊版本只有相容性。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 頁面，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`、屬性會傳回，否則為屬性會傳回。When is `true`, the property returns ; otherwise the property returns . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`cookieless`工作階段屬性`true`Web.config 檔案中。The following code example sets the `cookieless` session attribute to `true` in the Web.config file. 此範例應用程式組態，屬性則會傳回。For this sample application configuration, the property would return . ``` ```

A控制項用來在網頁上顯示工作階段狀態的內容。A control is used to display the contents of session state on the Web page. 方法用來逐一查看工作階段狀態集合，並填入控制項。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. value.span: 如果工作階段內嵌於 URL，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the session is embedded in the URL; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 專門用來識別工作階段與每個瀏覽器。ASP.NET identifies sessions uniquely with each browser. 根據預設，在瀏覽器中不會過期的工作階段 cookie 中儲存工作階段的唯一識別碼。By default, the unique identifier for a session is stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser. 您可以指定，工作階段識別項不會儲存在 cookie 中設定`cookieless`屬性`true`中的組態項目。You can specify that session identifiers not be stored in a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute to `true` in the configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善您的應用程式的安全性，您的應用程式可讓的使用者登出，此時它應該呼叫方法。To improve the security of your application, your application should allow users to log out, at which point it should call the method. 這會減少潛在的不必要的來源，在 URL 中使用的唯一識別碼，以擷取儲存在使用者工作階段中的私用資料。This reduces the potential for an unwanted source using the unique identifier in the URL to retrieve private data stored in the session for a user. ASP.NET 會維護無 cookie 工作階段狀態，藉由自動將唯一的工作階段識別碼插入頁面的 URL。ASP.NET maintains cookieless session state by automatically inserting a unique session ID into the page's URL. 例如，包含唯一的工作階段識別碼 lit3py55t21z5v55vlm25s55 ASP.NET 已經修改下列 URL:For example, the following URL has been modified by ASP.NET to include the unique session ID lit3py55t21z5v55vlm25s55: ``` http://www.example.com/(S(4danlfat035muve4g0mvgfrr))/orderform.aspx ``` ASP.NET 修改內嵌連結中的工作階段識別碼值之前傳送至瀏覽器的每個頁面包含所有要求的頁面的連結。ASP.NET modifies the links contained in all requested pages by embedding a session-ID value in the links just before sending each page to the browser. 維護工作階段狀態，只要使用者依照站台提供的連結路徑。Session state is maintained as long as the user follows the path of links that the site provides. 不過，如果使用者代理程式重寫 URL，工作階段狀態的執行個體將會遺失。However, if the user agent rewrites a URL, the session-state instance will be lost. 應用程式名稱會遵循的斜線之後和任何剩餘的檔案或虛擬目錄識別項之前在 URL 中內嵌工作階段識別碼。The session ID is embedded in the URL after the slash that follows the application name and before any remaining file or virtual-directory identifier. 這可讓 ASP.NET 應用程式名稱解析之前涉及要求中。This allows ASP.NET to resolve the application name before involving the in the request. 根據預設，在已經回收無 cookie 工作階段中所使用的工作階段識別碼。By default, session identifiers used in cookieless sessions are recycled. 也就是提出要求時已過期的工作階段 id，如果新的工作階段會使用啟動要求所提供的工作階段識別碼。That is, if a request is made with a session ID that has expired, a new session is started using the session ID supplied with the request. 這種行為可能會導致不必要的工作階段資料共用時包含無 cookie 工作階段識別碼的連結共用的多個瀏覽器中，可能是透過搜尋引擎或其他程式。This behavior can result in the unwanted sharing of session data when a link that contains a cookieless session ID is shared with multiple browsers, perhaps through a search engine or other program. 您可以降低共用多個用戶端停用工作階段識別項的循環的工作階段資料的可能性。You can reduce the possibility of session data being shared by multiple clients by disabling the recycling of session identifiers. 若要這樣做，請設定`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性的組態項目`true`。To do this, set the `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute of the configuration element to `true`. 這將導致過期的工作階段 id 進行無 cookie 工作階段要求產生新的工作階段識別碼This will result in a new session ID being generated when a cookieless session request is made with an expired session ID. 請注意，如果過期的工作階段識別碼所提出之要求使用 HTTP`POST`方法，則任何張貼的資料將會遺失時`regenerateExpiredSessionId`是`true`，因為 ASP.NET 執行重新導向，以確保瀏覽器 URL 中有新的工作階段識別項。Note that if the request made with the expired session ID uses the HTTP `POST` method, then any posted data will be lost when `regenerateExpiredSessionId` is `true`, as ASP.NET performs a redirect to ensure that the browser has the new session identifier in the URL. > [!NOTE] > 同時設定`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性`true`降低的可能性不想要共用的工作階段資料，它無法防止不必要的來源存取另一位使用者的工作階段取得值和包含在伺服器的要求。While setting the `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute to `true` reduces the possibility of unwanted sharing of session data, it does not protect against an unwanted source gaining access to the session of another user by obtaining the value and including it in requests to the server. 如果您在工作階段狀態儲存私人或機密資訊，建議您搭配使用 SSL 來加密任何瀏覽器和包含的伺服器之間的通訊。If you are storing private or sensitive information in session state, it is recommended that you use SSL to encrypt any communication between the browser and server that includes the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`cookieless`設為 true，在 Web.config 檔案中的工作階段屬性。The following code example sets the `cookieless` session attribute to true in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供屬性為了與 ASP 的舊版本只有相容性。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 頁面，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不會在工作階段狀態儲存的地區設定識別碼。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 屬性存取屬性以取得設定的識別碼。The property accesses the property to get and set the identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何設定伺服器供或工作階段狀態儲存體，請參閱[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For information about how to configure your server for or session-state storage, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`mode`工作階段屬性Web.config 檔案中。The following code example sets the `mode` session attribute to in the Web.config file. SQL Server 工作階段模式中，`sqlConnectionString`也是必要的屬性。For SQL Server session mode, the `sqlConnectionString` attribute is also required. ``` ```

param.name: name

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作階段狀態集合中未包含具有指定的項目`name`，維持不變的集合。If the session-state collection does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用工作階段狀態中儲存值方法。The following example shows how to store values in session state by using the method. 它也示範如何使用工作階段狀態中移除值方法。It also shows how to remove values in session state by using the method. A控制項用來在網頁上顯示工作階段狀態的內容。A control is used to display the contents of session state on the Web page. 方法用來逐一查看工作階段狀態集合，並填入控制項。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSessionState#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/HttpSessionStateAddCS.aspx#13)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSessionState#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/HttpSessionStateAddVB.aspx#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SessionID As String
public: property System::String ^ SessionID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得工作階段的唯一識別項。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier for the session.
The unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來唯一識別與伺服器上的工作階段資料的瀏覽器。The property is used to uniquely identify a browser with session data on the server. 隨機 ASP.NET 產生並儲存在瀏覽器中不會過期的工作階段 cookie 值。The value is randomly generated by ASP.NET and stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser. 值然後傳送至 ASP.NET 應用程式的每個要求的 cookie 中。The value is then sent in a cookie with each request to the ASP.NET application. 如果您想要停用的 cookie，ASP.NET 應用程式中使用，仍能使用的工作階段狀態，您可以設定您的應用程式的 URL，而不是 cookie 中儲存的工作階段識別項，藉由設定`cookieless`組態的屬性項目`true`，或，在您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。If you want to disable the use of cookies in your ASP.NET application and still make use of session state, you can configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL instead of a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element to `true`, or to , in the Web.config file for your application. 您可以判斷是否瀏覽器是否支援 cookie 所指定的值是 ASP.NET如`cookieless`屬性。You can have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are supported by the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 您也可以判斷是否啟用 cookie 的瀏覽器所指定的值是 ASP.NET如`cookieless`屬性。You can also have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are enabled for the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 如果支援 cookie，則當已指定，或已啟用時指定，則工作階段識別碼會儲存在 cookie 中; 否則為將在 URL 中儲存的工作階段識別碼。If cookies are supported when is specified, or enabled when is specified, then the session identifier will be stored in a cookie; otherwise the session identifier will be stored in the URL. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. 伺服器與瀏覽器之間傳送以純文字格式在 cookie 或 URL。The is sent between the server and the browser in clear text, either in a cookie or in the URL. 如此一來，不必要的來源無法存取其他使用者工作階段取得值並將其納入中伺服器的要求。As a result, an unwanted source could gain access to the session of another user by obtaining the value and including it in requests to the server. 如果您在工作階段狀態儲存私人或機密資訊，建議您搭配使用 SSL 來加密任何瀏覽器和包含的伺服器之間的通訊。If you are storing private or sensitive information in session state, it is recommended that you use SSL to encrypt any communication between the browser and server that includes the . 使用 cookie 架構工作階段狀態，ASP.NET 不會配置儲存體的工作階段資料，直到物件使用。When using cookie-based session state, ASP.NET does not allocate storage for session data until the object is used. 如此一來，新的工作階段識別碼產生的每個頁面要求，直到存取工作階段物件。As a result, a new session ID is generated for each page request until the session object is accessed. 如果您的應用程式需要整個工作階段的靜態的工作階段 ID，您可以實作`Session_Start`應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案和存放區中的資料中的方法物件修正的工作階段識別碼，或您可以使用程式碼中的另一個組件您的應用程式明確地將資料儲存在物件。If your application requires a static session ID for the entire session, you can either implement the `Session_Start` method in the application's Global.asax file and store data in the object to fix the session ID, or you can use code in another part of your application to explicitly store data in the object. 如果您的應用程式使用無 cookie 工作階段狀態，工作階段識別碼所產生的第一個頁面檢視和維護整個工作階段。If your application uses cookieless session state, the session ID is generated on the first page view and is maintained for the entire session. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案中設定工作階段狀態使用無 cookie 工作階段識別項。The following code example shows a Web.config file that configures session state to use cookieless session identifiers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ StaticObjects { System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由 ASP.NET 應用程式檔 Global.asax 內 標記所宣告的物件集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects declared by tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.

value.span: ，包含 Global.asax 檔案中所宣告的物件。

span.span: An containing objects declared in the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果頁面上的物件不支援序列化和是跨處理序 (或)，將不會建立物件，並將不會加入至這個集合。If an object on a page does not support serialization and is out-of-process ( or ), the object will not be created and will not be added to this collection. 提供屬性為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容性。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列出`id`中物件的物件類型和集合。The following code example lists the `id` and object type of the objects in the collection. [!code-csharp[HttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/snippetscs.aspx#10)] [!code-vb[HttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#10)]

public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得物件，這個物件可以用來對工作階段狀態值集合進行同步存取。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection of session-state values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得並設定工作階段狀態提供者終止工作階段之前，要求之間所允許的時間長度 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 逾時期限，以分鐘為單位。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以使用應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中設定`timeout`屬性的組態項目，或者您可以設定直接使用應用程式程式碼的屬性值。The property can be set in the Web.config file for an application using the `timeout` attribute of the configuration element, or you can set the property value directly using application code. 屬性無法設定的值大於 525,600 分鐘 （1 年）。The property cannot be set to a value greater than 525,600 minutes (1 year). 預設值是 20 分鐘。The default value is 20 minutes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`timeout`Web.config 檔案中的工作階段屬性為 30 分鐘。The following code example sets the `timeout` session attribute to 30 minutes in the Web.config file. ``` ```
